original_text: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write; These things saith he that is holy, he that is true, he that hath the key of David, he that openeth, and no man shutteth; and shutteth, and no man openeth;
korean_text: 빌라델비아 교회의 사자에게 편지하라 거룩하고 진실하사 다윗의 열쇠를 가지신 이 곧 열면 닫을 사람이 없고 닫으면 열 사람이 없는 그가 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And to the angel of the church in Philadelphia write;
These things saith he that is holy,
he that hath the key of David,
he that openeth, and no man shutteth;
and shutteth, and no man openeth;
